In the background, a row of large glass windows extends across the top half of the frame, through which other people can be seen in the background.

Furthermore, the description of the background is vague; the people seen through the glass are significantly out of focus, which creates a shallow depth of field that isolates the foreground fans, a key aspect of the shot's spatial composition that is not mentioned. Finally, the caption fails to note that all the fans are looking and cheering toward the upper right of the frame, a vital piece of information that defines their spatial relationship to the unseen event they are watching.
